definition: an irregularly shaped spot, to mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
details:
noun
- an irregularly shaped spot
= synonyms: splodge, splotch
verb
- to mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
= example: to mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
= synonyms: streak
